This game is an absolute classic. Still fun as hell even this many years later.

CLASICO IMPERDIBLE DEL PC.
si son nuevos en el mundo del pc gaming, este es uno de los mejores juegos con los que podrian adentrarse a este mundo.

This game is very near and dear to my heart. The second game is too, but without this, we wouldn't have gotten the sequel. I love the entire concept, world, and sarcasm. The puzzles and physics are cool. The hidden rooms (Rattman dens?) are a lovely, haunting, nifty thing to add. If you played Portal 2 but ignored Portal, then you're doing it wrong! Lol.
This random game meant to be a one off for the Orange Box ended up being the beginning of something I wish I could experience all over again.
its one of my favorate games

1. good story
2. replaying the story is fun
3. tons of mods (and it's not hard to make mods)

A pesar de ya tener varios a√±os, este es uno de los mejores juegos que existen; es innovador, divertido y te la pasas muy bien al momento de jugarlo. Si te gustan los videojuegos ten por seguro que Portal te va a encantar. 10/10

Got Portal 1 and 2 in a bundle on sale for less than $4.00 CAD. It was well worth the money. The level and puzzle design is amazing, the storytelling is done very well with a dark sense of humor, and purely through gameplay... never once is control taken from the player. It also plays just fine on lower end hardware. I'm looking forward to playing the sequel when I get to it.

Brilliant game, highly recommended. Enjoy working out how to get through the levels, can be a bit annoying (might just be me doing things the hardest way possible though) but all in all a very enjoyable and engaging game.
Commentary mode gives great insight on how much attention to detail they put into level design.

Old but gold. Fun and creative puzzle game.

7.8
A great starter game for those who just got their PC. 10/10 in many ways!
